extendedInfo.description: Akinator can read your mind and tell you what character you are thinking about, just by asking a few questions. Think of a real or fictional character and Akinator will try to guess who it is. Will you dare challenge the Genie?NEW: Available in Arabic (only from Android OS 4.0)Try this free version of the famous Genie! Discover the brand new Akinometer, share your results on Facebook and turn on the child filter to let your children play safely. Version also adapted for your tablet.+++++ Play more, without any limits! +++++Akinator welcomes you to his lab to show you the most extraordinary and unusual potions.- The supercharged potion unlocks many new characters. Will you manage to beat Akinator?- The potion of sleeplessness allows you to play an unlimited number of games. Who will be the first to give up: Akinator or you?- The radiant potion removes all ads from the app.THE ULTIMATE POTION ! Akinator deserves the best! This potion combines the effects of all the others. It will also allow you to customize your characters so you too can impress your friends.Become Akinator's fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/AkinatorFollow Akinator on Twitter: http://twitter.com/akinator_teamPlease note:-Akinator requires an Internet connection to use his magic lamp. Turn on Wifi or be sure to have a data plan.-Available in several languages (French, English, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Japanese, Arabic, Russian, Italian, Chinese, Turkish, Korean, Hebrew, and Dutch)-To select your language, don't forget to scroll down the list to find it.-Additional background (Akinator in Japan)

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Its an awesome game it just suks that u can only play a number of times i would rate a 5 star if that was better
reviews.author: Luis Barahona

reviews.title: Galaxy ace 2
reviews.comment: It\'s awesome!! Dont worry people i know how to play this game a thousand times. After you play the 3 trials go to the task manager then select akinator the genie then press force close and reset/clear data then boom!!
reviews.author: Elma Maloloyon

reviews.title: More playing time?
reviews.comment: This is a really cool app. If it could be played more than twice without having to buy it, I would give it five stars.
reviews.author: Matthew muckenhirn

reviews.title: The ( almost ) All Knowing Akinator
reviews.comment: This is so cool that he can guess most of the characters you think of by simple questions. Just allow him to know more characters on free version, longer play time, n not have to constantly by the same potion to do so.
reviews.author: sean landa

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: But the play limit sucks. Remove it and I\'m sure everyone will 5 star
reviews.author: Kailey Hegg

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Okay when it can guess alternative punk rock band members such as Hayley Williams when thats what im thinking thats pretty amazing
reviews.author: Nick Faust

reviews.title: Free??
reviews.comment: I had already paid for the ultimate potion and now they want me to pay again.. Is this a bug or did I use it too much?? Otherwise would\'ve given 5 stars
reviews.author: Angel Garcia

reviews.title: This game used to be a lot of fun
reviews.comment: The \"free\" version gave users so much more, now it\'s basically a trial version.
reviews.author: Angelica Arambula

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Love this game. Great way to pass the time. But occasionally it\'ll try to tell me that I\'ve used my plays for the day, even though I\'ve bought the ultimate potion. Fix that, and I\'ll give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Victoria Sherman

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: My friends love it! It hasn\'t guessed only about 5/70 times. Really fun to play with. By the way, the Genie is a playa! He has a homosexual wife and a pregnant girlfriend. ;3
reviews.author: Aleks Emm

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Won\'t even stay open on my HTC one x closes its self after 10 secs and you can\'t even delete it and now I have got a virus   I would give it no stars if I could
reviews.author: Tyler Hughes

reviews.title: Failed in first attempt
reviews.comment: I thought of harry potter .the genie asked me 20 irritating questions n finally came up with the wrong answer. Not inpressed cos 20 quetions is too long.. Even for a wrong answer
reviews.author: Johnson Joshea

reviews.comment: This is a great game although the fact you have to buy or play other games to get features is the downside\tGreat and suprising game but...
reviews.author: jcrossman129

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Great game but don\'t want to pay for extra characters and want more than 3 games ? At least 6 or more and more characters and I would rate this 5 stars
reviews.author: Maher Ahmed

reviews.title: Only two a day !!
reviews.comment: If you use 2 in one day thats all you get untill the next day it would be good if that never happend and i would also buy full version !
reviews.author: Scott Holden

reviews.title: Cool, but...
reviews.comment: Why only three times?! At least ten, bro. If I want to play as many times as I want, I have to install, play it, uninstall, then install it again.
reviews.author: Jared Hansen

reviews.title: Fun, fun
reviews.comment: Very cool free app.    Addicting.   Must be linked to Google database or something.   I haven\'t been able to stump him yet.   He\'s very fast too.   Cool.
reviews.author: sandy beeson

reviews.title: This thing is epic
reviews.comment: Some of the questions asked are really specific. (Is he a mouse? Does he eat humans? Is he a werewolf?)
reviews.author: Alexandrus Azalea Lupin

reviews.title: Akinator!
reviews.comment: The best. Its my first time to play this game. So amazed!
reviews.author: Tiara Joya

reviews.title: I like this app
reviews.comment: I like this app but every day I have to day to play it when I\'m bored so......so........
reviews.author: Dinara Utemuratova
